metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1957 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache Shiro before 1.5.2, when using Apache Shiro with Spring dynamic controllers, a specially crafted request may cause an authentication bypass.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-1957` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-3~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shiro package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-3~18.04.1').
